about-us.title: About Us
about-us.mission: Our mission is to provide the best buying and selling experience. Our platform is designed to help you find the best products and services at the best prices.
about-us.community: Our community is made up of people who share the same interests and values. Our goal is to create a safe and friendly environment for all our users.
about-us.thank-you: Thank you for being part of our community! We hope you enjoy using our platform.
about-us.explore: Explore our platform and discover the best deals!

helpPage.title: Help Page
helpPage.whatIsMerkatContent: Merkat is an online marketplace dedicated to serving the Ex-Yu region, connecting buyers and sellers with a user-friendly and secure platform.
helpPage.howToCreateAccount: How do I create an account?
helpPage.howToCreateAccountContent: To create an account, click on the "Register" button at the top right corner of the homepage and fill in the required information.
helpPage.howToListItem: How do I list an item for sale?
helpPage.howToListItemContent: To list an item for sale, log in to your account, go to the "Add Listing" section, and fill in the details of your item.
helpPage.howToContactSeller: How do I contact a seller?
helpPage.howToContactSellerContent: You can contact a seller by clicking on the "Contact Seller" button on the listing page.
helpPage.returnPolicyContent: We do not have a return policy. Buyers should be aware of false advertisements and scams.
